entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 8.
